directions: Simmer prunes and 1/2 cup brandy in large saucepan, covered, until brandy is absorbed, about 4 minutes. Cool.
Place softened ice cream in large shallow plastic freezer container. Mix in prunes and remaining 2 tablespoons brandy. Cover and freeze. (Can be prepared 1 week ahead. Keep frozen.)
ingredients: 1 cup pitted prunes, cut into quarters
1 quart vanilla ice cream, softened slightly
title: Brandied-Prune Ice Cream
